```{r specify files}


set_options()

import::from(dplyr, "mutate", "select","filter")

thisfolder <- "outputFolder"
thisbgmfile <- "PugetSound_89b_NAD83.bgm"
thesecountries <- c('Canada','United States') # Natural Earth regions to use as background
outdietfile <- "AMPS_OUTDietCheck.txt"
#functional groups csv files should have colnames Code IsTurnedOn Name `Long Name` GroupType
groups_csv <- "PugetSoundAtlantisFunctionalGroups_salmon_rectype4_bf.csv"
thisoutncfile <- "AMPS_OUT.nc"
startyear <- 2011 #model start year, used for diets
timeperiod <- 73 #output frequency, used for diets
#code assumes that non-dynamic polygons are continuous
ini.pol <- 61 #initial non-dynamic polygon 
end.pol <- 89 #final non-dynamic polygon
```

```{r spatial data, include=FALSE}

#extract bgm
emocc_sf <- get_bgm(thisbgmfile, thisfolder)
#load atlantis files
atlantis_outputs <- load_output(thisfolder, thisoutncfile, timeperiod)
#get group information
grp_list <-get_groups(groups_csv, thisfolder)

```

```{r calc plots,warning=FALSE,message=F}
# Here we calculate and store the actual plots

grps <- grp_list$grps

# abundance
tic("Abundance plots: ")
verts <- grps %>% dplyr::filter(GroupType%in%c("FISH","SHARK","BIRD","MAMMAL")) %>% pluck('Name')
verts_n_at_a <- purrr::map(verts,~plot_abun(.), atlantis_outputs, ini.pol, end.pol)
verts_names <- grps %>% dplyr::filter(GroupType%in%c("FISH","SHARK","BIRD","MAMMAL")) %>% purrr::pluck('Long Name')
toc()

# biomass
tictoc::tic("Biomass plots: ")
biomass_timeseries_list <- purrr::map(grps$Name,~plot_biomass(.))
all_grp_names <- grps %>% purrr::pluck('Long Name')
tictoc::toc()

# weight at age
tictoc::tic("Weight at age plots: ")
verts_wage <- purrr::map(verts,~plot_wage_timeseries(., grp_list, atlantis_outputs))
tictoc::toc()

# weight at age
tictoc::tic("RN vs. SN plots: ")
verts_rnsn <- purrr::map(verts,~plot_rn_vs_sn(., grp_list, atlantis_outputs))
tictoc::toc()

#spatial
tictoc::tic("Spatial plots: ")
spdist_plots <- purrr::map(grps$Name,~plot_spatial(.,plot_type="spdist", grp_list, atlantis_outputs))
cog_plots <- purrr::map(grps$Name,~plot_spatial(.,plot_type="cog"))
tictoc::toc()

#diets
tictoc::tic("Diet plots: ")
diets_to_plot<-pred_groups$Name
diets_names <- pred_groups$`Long Name`
diet_plots <- purrr::map(diets_to_plot, plot_Diets, dietsAll=atlantis_outputs$diet_check, threshold=0.9, yearsselected="all", grp_list, atlantis_outputs, startyear)
tictoc::toc()
```

  }
}
